original_title: Bryan Beller: Mastering Tone and Versatility
overview: Extreme bass player Bryan Beller (Steve Vai, Dethklok, Mike Keneally, Dweezil Zappa) explores how he combines tone, technique, and artistry to play some of the most demanding music in the industry. Learn to master your mind and achieve your signature tone no matter what type of music you're called on to play! Includes live performances with Gene Hoglan, Mike Keneally, Joe Travers, and Kira Small.
title: Bryan Beller: Mastering Tone and Versatility
